changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION validate_edge_properties(data jsonb, aId uuid) RETURNS boolean AS $f$ BEGIN RETURN SELECT validate_json_schema(a.schema, jsonb) FROM existential_network_authorization a WHERE a.id = aId END $f$ LANGUAGE 'plpgsql' IMMUTABLE;

changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION validate_facet_properties(data jsonb, fId uuid) RETURNS boolean AS $f$ BEGIN RETURN SELECT validate_json_schema(f.schema, jsonb) FROM facet f WHERE f.id = fId END $f$ LANGUAGE 'plpgsql' IMMUTABLE;
